      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      protected void setSummary(java.lang.String text)
      Sets the summary string directly into the text view to avoid be.robinj.ubuntu.thirdparty.SeekBarPreference#notifyChanged() call which was interrupting in the seek bar's thumb movement.
      protected abstract java.lang.String toSummary(java.lang.Object newValue)
      Convert integer progress to summary string.

        protected final void setSummary(java.lang.String text)
        Sets the summary string directly into the text view to avoid be.robinj.ubuntu.thirdparty.SeekBarPreference#notifyChanged() call which was interrupting in the seek bar's thumb movement.
